hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT ORGANISATION_ID, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ABN, ACCEPT_RCTI, ACN, ADDRESS_LINE, ANZIC_CODE, AUTHORIZED_PERSON, BANK_KEY_WORD, BILLING_NAME, BRANCH_NUMBER, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, COUNTRY, TO_CHAR(CSI_EXECUTION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CSI_EXECUTION_DATE, TO_CHAR(CSI_REVIEW_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CSI_REVIEW_DATE, CUSTOMER_CATEGORY, CUSTOMER_STREAM, CUSTOMER_TYPE, EMAIL, ENTITY_STAFF_CONTACT, ES_ACCOUNT_MANAGER, ES_BD_MANAGER, ES_CS_CONSULTANT, ES_CUSTOMER_ADMINISTRATOR, ES_EXEC_RELATIONSHIP, ES_MIGRATION_ADMINISTRATOR, ES_MIGRATION_CONSULTANT, ES_PAYROLL_CONSULTANT, FAX1, FAX2, TO_CHAR(FIRST_CONTACT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FIRST_CONTACT_DATE, TO_CHAR(FROM_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FROM_DATE, GST_NUMBER, GST_REG, HISTORY, JURISDICTION, MAIN_CONTACT, MOBILE, TO_CHAR(MSA_END_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS MSA_END_DATE, TO_CHAR(MSA_EXECUTION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS MSA_EXECUTION_DATE, TO_CHAR(MSA_START_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS MSA_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(NEW_FLAG_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS NEW_FLAG_DATE, ORGANISATION_NAME, ORGANISATION_OVERVIEW, ORGANISATION_TYPE, ORG_DORMANT, ORG_HIERARCHY, PHONE1, PHONE2, POSTAL_ADDRESS_LINE, POSTAL_COUNTRY, POSTAL_POST_CODE, POSTAL_STATE, POSTAL_SUBURB, POST_CODE, PRODUCT, REFERENCE_NO_1, REFERENCE_NO_2, REFERENCE_NO_3, RELATIONSHIP, REPORTING_LINE, ROLE, SPECIAL_REQUIREMENTS, SRO_NUMBER, STATE, STP_BMS_ID, SUBURB, SWIM_LANE, TAX_INVOICE_ACCEPTANCE_TYPE, TERMINATION_NOTICE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS TO_DATE, WEB_ADDRESS FROM HP_ORGANISATION_D WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO HP_ORGANISATION_D ( ORGANISATION_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ABN, ACCEPT_RCTI, ACN, ADDRESS_LINE, ANZIC_CODE, AUTHORIZED_PERSON, BANK_KEY_WORD, BILLING_NAME, BRANCH_NUMBER, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, COUNTRY, CSI_EXECUTION_DATE, CSI_REVIEW_DATE, CUSTOMER_CATEGORY, CUSTOMER_STREAM, CUSTOMER_TYPE, EMAIL, ENTITY_STAFF_CONTACT, ES_ACCOUNT_MANAGER, ES_BD_MANAGER, ES_CS_CONSULTANT, ES_CUSTOMER_ADMINISTRATOR, ES_EXEC_RELATIONSHIP, ES_MIGRATION_ADMINISTRATOR, ES_MIGRATION_CONSULTANT, ES_PAYROLL_CONSULTANT, FAX1, FAX2, FIRST_CONTACT_DATE, FROM_DATE, GST_NUMBER, GST_REG, HISTORY, JURISDICTION, MAIN_CONTACT, MOBILE, MSA_END_DATE, MSA_EXECUTION_DATE, MSA_START_DATE, NEW_FLAG_DATE, ORGANISATION_NAME, ORGANISATION_OVERVIEW, ORGANISATION_TYPE, ORG_DORMANT, ORG_HIERARCHY, PHONE1, PHONE2, POSTAL_ADDRESS_LINE, POSTAL_COUNTRY, POSTAL_POST_CODE, POSTAL_STATE, POSTAL_SUBURB, POST_CODE, PRODUCT, REFERENCE_NO_1, REFERENCE_NO_2, REFERENCE_NO_3, RELATIONSHIP, REPORTING_LINE, ROLE, SPECIAL_REQUIREMENTS, SRO_NUMBER, STATE, STP_BMS_ID, SUBURB, SWIM_LANE, TAX_INVOICE_ACCEPTANCE_TYPE, TERMINATION_NOTICE, TO_DATE, WEB_ADDRESS ) VALUES ( ${ORGANISATION_ID}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${ABN}, ${ACCEPT_RCTI}, ${ACN}, ${ADDRESS_LINE}, ${ANZIC_CODE}, ${AUTHORIZED_PERSON}, ${BANK_KEY_WORD}, ${BILLING_NAME}, ${BRANCH_NUMBER}, ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, ${COUNTRY}, ${CSI_EXECUTION_DATE}, ${CSI_REVIEW_DATE}, ${CUSTOMER_CATEGORY}, ${CUSTOMER_STREAM}, ${CUSTOMER_TYPE}, ${EMAIL}, ${ENTITY_STAFF_CONTACT}, ${ES_ACCOUNT_MANAGER}, ${ES_BD_MANAGER}, ${ES_CS_CONSULTANT}, ${ES_CUSTOMER_ADMINISTRATOR}, ${ES_EXEC_RELATIONSHIP}, ${ES_MIGRATION_ADMINISTRATOR}, ${ES_MIGRATION_CONSULTANT}, ${ES_PAYROLL_CONSULTANT}, ${FAX1}, ${FAX2}, ${FIRST_CONTACT_DATE}, ${FROM_DATE}, ${GST_NUMBER}, ${GST_REG}, ${HISTORY}, ${JURISDICTION}, ${MAIN_CONTACT}, ${MOBILE}, ${MSA_END_DATE}, ${MSA_EXECUTION_DATE}, ${MSA_START_DATE}, ${NEW_FLAG_DATE}, ${ORGANISATION_NAME}, ${ORGANISATION_OVERVIEW}, ${ORGANISATION_TYPE}, ${ORG_DORMANT}, ${ORG_HIERARCHY}, ${PHONE1}, ${PHONE2}, ${POSTAL_ADDRESS_LINE}, ${POSTAL_COUNTRY}, ${POSTAL_POST_CODE}, ${POSTAL_STATE}, ${POSTAL_SUBURB}, ${POST_CODE}, ${PRODUCT}, ${REFERENCE_NO_1}, ${REFERENCE_NO_2}, ${REFERENCE_NO_3}, ${RELATIONSHIP}, ${REPORTING_LINE}, ${ROLE}, ${SPECIAL_REQUIREMENTS}, ${SRO_NUMBER}, ${STATE}, ${STP_BMS_ID}, ${SUBURB}, ${SWIM_LANE}, ${TAX_INVOICE_ACCEPTANCE_TYPE}, ${TERMINATION_NOTICE}, ${TO_DATE}, ${WEB_ADDRESS} )

UPDATE HP_ORGANISATION_D SET CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ABN = ${ABN}, ACCEPT_RCTI = ${ACCEPT_RCTI}, ACN = ${ACN}, ADDRESS_LINE = ${ADDRESS_LINE}, ANZIC_CODE = ${ANZIC_CODE}, AUTHORIZED_PERSON = ${AUTHORIZED_PERSON}, BANK_KEY_WORD = ${BANK_KEY_WORD}, BILLING_NAME = ${BILLING_NAME}, BRANCH_NUMBER = ${BRANCH_NUMBER}, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID = ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, COUNTRY = ${COUNTRY}, CSI_EXECUTION_DATE = ${CSI_EXECUTION_DATE}, CSI_REVIEW_DATE = ${CSI_REVIEW_DATE}, CUSTOMER_CATEGORY = ${CUSTOMER_CATEGORY}, CUSTOMER_STREAM = ${CUSTOMER_STREAM}, CUSTOMER_TYPE = ${CUSTOMER_TYPE}, EMAIL = ${EMAIL}, ENTITY_STAFF_CONTACT = ${ENTITY_STAFF_CONTACT}, ES_ACCOUNT_MANAGER = ${ES_ACCOUNT_MANAGER}, ES_BD_MANAGER = ${ES_BD_MANAGER}, ES_CS_CONSULTANT = ${ES_CS_CONSULTANT}, ES_CUSTOMER_ADMINISTRATOR = ${ES_CUSTOMER_ADMINISTRATOR}, ES_EXEC_RELATIONSHIP = ${ES_EXEC_RELATIONSHIP}, ES_MIGRATION_ADMINISTRATOR = ${ES_MIGRATION_ADMINISTRATOR}, ES_MIGRATION_CONSULTANT = ${ES_MIGRATION_CONSULTANT}, ES_PAYROLL_CONSULTANT = ${ES_PAYROLL_CONSULTANT}, FAX1 = ${FAX1}, FAX2 = ${FAX2}, FIRST_CONTACT_DATE = ${FIRST_CONTACT_DATE}, FROM_DATE = ${FROM_DATE}, GST_NUMBER = ${GST_NUMBER}, GST_REG = ${GST_REG}, HISTORY = ${HISTORY}, JURISDICTION = ${JURISDICTION}, MAIN_CONTACT = ${MAIN_CONTACT}, MOBILE = ${MOBILE}, MSA_END_DATE = ${MSA_END_DATE}, MSA_EXECUTION_DATE = ${MSA_EXECUTION_DATE}, MSA_START_DATE = ${MSA_START_DATE}, NEW_FLAG_DATE = ${NEW_FLAG_DATE}, ORGANISATION_NAME = ${ORGANISATION_NAME}, ORGANISATION_OVERVIEW = ${ORGANISATION_OVERVIEW}, ORGANISATION_TYPE = ${ORGANISATION_TYPE}, ORG_DORMANT = ${ORG_DORMANT}, ORG_HIERARCHY = ${ORG_HIERARCHY}, PHONE1 = ${PHONE1}, PHONE2 = ${PHONE2}, POSTAL_ADDRESS_LINE = ${POSTAL_ADDRESS_LINE}, POSTAL_COUNTRY = ${POSTAL_COUNTRY}, POSTAL_POST_CODE = ${POSTAL_POST_CODE}, POSTAL_STATE = ${POSTAL_STATE}, POSTAL_SUBURB = ${POSTAL_SUBURB}, POST_CODE = ${POST_CODE}, PRODUCT = ${PRODUCT}, REFERENCE_NO_1 = ${REFERENCE_NO_1}, REFERENCE_NO_2 = ${REFERENCE_NO_2}, REFERENCE_NO_3 = ${REFERENCE_NO_3}, RELATIONSHIP = ${RELATIONSHIP}, REPORTING_LINE = ${REPORTING_LINE}, ROLE = ${ROLE}, SPECIAL_REQUIREMENTS = ${SPECIAL_REQUIREMENTS}, SRO_NUMBER = ${SRO_NUMBER}, STATE = ${STATE}, STP_BMS_ID = ${STP_BMS_ID}, SUBURB = ${SUBURB}, SWIM_LANE = ${SWIM_LANE}, TAX_INVOICE_ACCEPTANCE_TYPE = ${TAX_INVOICE_ACCEPTANCE_TYPE}, TERMINATION_NOTICE = ${TERMINATION_NOTICE}, TO_DATE = ${TO_DATE}, WEB_ADDRESS = ${WEB_ADDRESS} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
